nlacp: If the requested appointment time does conflict with an existing appointments, the patient is presented with a list of the three next non-overlapping available appointment times within 7 days of the requested date.

truth.subject: none
truth.condition: requested appointment time does conflict with an existing appointment

pred.subject: patient
pred.condition: requested appointment time does conflict with an existing appointment

pred.subject: patient
pred.resource: list of the three next non-overlapping available appointment times
pred.condition: requested appointment time does conflict with an existing appointment
